name: twitter_react_test
description: Project to learn how to play with streaming data via react

scripts.start: rm -f build/* && webpack --progress -d && cp web/index.css build/ && cp web/index.html build/ && PORT=8080 node index.js
scripts.make: rm -f build/* && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --progress && cp web/index.css build/ && cp web/index.html build/

author: ByzantineFailure <byzanitnefailure@gmail.com>
